homepage.subtitle: Production of websites, apps and digital presence

categories.websites: Cutting-edge website designs that blend innovation with user-centric solutions to boost engagement and business growth.

websites_category_page.description:
I have always strived to create websites that are not only aesthetically pleasing but also intuitive and user-friendly. I believe that the integration of modern technologies and frameworks has allowed me to achieve this goal while also enhancing the performance of the websites that I develop.
In this section, you'll find personal and client projects where I've utilized a range of modern technologies such as React, Redux, Next JS, Web basics, Figma, Sketch and Affinity to create visually stunning and functionally-rich websites.
I hope that you will enjoy the websites as much as I enjoyed developing them!

projects.CDEFF: Welcome to the Francisco Franco Sports Club project! Score big with the first website of a local sports club in Madeira Island. Dive into the latest updates on club activities, explore insightful blog articles, and find detailed information on tournaments. It's more than just a website; it's your ultimate playbook for all things sports-related! üèÜ
projects.PrimeTravel: Check out PrimeTravel, the ultimate travel agency sidekick! It's not just a tool; it's a showcase of top-notch Fullstack Developer skills, designed to wow recruiters and managers üòÅ Think of it as your personal assistant for running your travel biz like a breeze. So, if you're in the travel game and craving an easier life, PrimeTravel's your golden ticket to success!
projects.B√°rbara: Dive into Barbara Lawyer's website, a testament to professionalism and empathy. It's not just about legal prowess; it's a digital handshake that says, 'I understand.' With sleek design and intuitive navigation, this site speaks volumes. Plus, it's packed with SEO magic and analytics to ensure it reaches those who need it most. üë©‚Äç‚öñÔ∏è
projects.carolina: Step into serenity with Carolina Jardim's website. Designed with empathy at its core, it's more than just a digital space; it's a calming sanctuary. From soothing colors to seamless navigation, every element whispers reassurance. And behind the scenes, powerful analytics and SEO wizardry ensure it touches hearts far and wide. üåø
projects.Curiosity: Welcome to Curiosity Gem, where every click leads to discovery. This isn't your average blog; it's a treasure trove of tech, finance, and career insights. With features like filtering, searching, and a handy CMS, it's a reader's paradise. Plus, with analytics and SEO mojo under the hood, it's bound to make waves in the digital realm. üîç
projects.Barber: Ready for a cut above the rest? Barber Studio's website is more than just a showcase; it's a canvas for barbering mastery. From crisp designs to dynamic portfolios, it's a nod to skill and style. And with analytics and SEO smarts, it's primed to attract the sharpest clients in town. üíà
projects.it: Step into the digital playground of IT Studios. This isn't your run-of-the-mill company site; it's a showcase of innovation and creativity. From sleek app displays to client testimonials, it's a testament to tech prowess. And with analytics and SEO finesse, it's sure to catch the eye of both recruiters and potential partners. üöÄ
projects.Memory: Get ready to exercise your brain with the Memory Game web app. Whether you're challenging friends or battling the computer, fun awaits. With scoreboards, multiplayer options, and slick design, it's a gaming experience like no other. Plus, with analytics and SEO superpowers, it's set to dominate the online gaming scene. üß†
projects.RIMA: Join the medical minds of RIMA on their digital journey. From intern camaraderie to event details, this website has it all. With a diverse organizing committee and a passion for continuity, it's a testament to collaboration. And with analytics and SEO prowess, it's sure to draw in eager participants from far and wide. ü©∫
projects.Architecture: Welcome to the Architecture Showcase, where every design speaks volumes. This isn't just a website; it's a minimalist masterpiece. From sleek portfolios to project highlights, it's a feast for the eyes. And with analytics and SEO optimization, it's poised to elevate architects to new heights of recognition. üèóÔ∏è

apps_category_page.description:
I am excited to showcase some of my personal projects specifically focused on mobile apps! As technology continues to advance, mobile devices have become an essential part of our daily lives, and developing mobile apps has become an increasingly important skill in the tech industry.
Here you'll find some of my mobile apps projects, where I've utilized modern technologies and frameworks such as React Native.
So, take a look around, and please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or feedback. Thank you for visiting!

projects.giggle: Need a good laugh? Giggle! has got you covered! Dive into a world of endless laughter with our hilarious collection of jokes, puns, and funny stories. Whether you're feeling down or just in need of a pick-me-up, Giggle! is here to brighten your day and leave you smiling from ear to ear. Get ready to LOL your way through the day! üòÇ
projects.randombox: Get ready for a whirlwind of excitement with Random Box! It's the ultimate challenge generator that brings a new thrill to your fingertips every day. From crazy dares to quirky tasks, you never know what surprise awaits inside the box! Gather your friends and embark on an adventure filled with laughter, spontaneity, and endless fun. Stay tuned for the grand unveiling! üé≤
projects.coolmind: Welcome to Coolmind, your ultimate companion for positive vibes and a healthy mindset! Say goodbye to stress and negativity as Coolmind guides you through uplifting exercises, gratitude practices, and mindfulness techniques. Harness the power of positivity and unleash your inner joy! Get ready to transform your mind, one smile at a time! üòä

about_me.title: About me
about_me.description:
Ever since I decided to make my passion for technology a professional career, I have been fully dedicated to the development of digital projects and the acquisition of new knowledge, in order to add competitive value in the creation of digital solutions.
My attention to detail, creative vision of the world and meticulous nature are the main contributions of my identity to the development and implementation of custom solutions. Throughout my career, I have developed projects for various sectors and I am mainly dedicated to creating websites, web apps, and branding.
My primary goal is to establish quick and long-lasting solutions, relationships, and assist in developing and implementing high-quality products.

experience.title: EXPERIENCE
experience.probely: At Probely, a leading name in cybersecurity, I've crafted user-friendly features with React & Typescript, enriching product capabilities and boosting client satisfaction. I've executed strategic updates to legacy codebases, emphasizing simplicity and efficiency to optimize operational performance. Furthermore, I've set coding standards, conducted refactoring, and bolstered test suite stability with Cypress. These efforts yielded tangible enhancements in code quality and system robustness, translating to significant time and resource efficiencies. Additionally, I've analyzed cybersecurity functionalities and elevated internal projects using Python and Django.
experience.paytrix: Joining Navro in its early phase provided me with a unique opportunity to make a significant impact across various company sectors. My key contributions included enhancing software reliability by integrating Cypress tests, which accelerated our release cycle and resolved critical issues. I took an active role in establishing coding standards and refining code practices, focusing on elevating both quality and efficiency. Additionally, I developed several automation tools that simplified project setups and streamlined financial data management. Leading our team was another highlight for me, where I fostered teamwork and synchronized efforts between product, back-end, and design departments, all aimed at achieving our collective goals.
experience.pipedrive: In Pipedrive, I had the opportunity to use microservices and event-driven architecture effectively, enhancing a crucial automation feature that significantly contributed to our revenue growth. My work involved utilizing a sophisticated tech stack, including React, TypeScript, Node, Docker, React Testing Library, and Cypress. This not only led to notable enhancements in code quality but also bolstered reliability through extensive testing. Participating in hackathons and strategic team projects, in collaboration with partners, allowed me to contribute to the brainstorming and development of pivotal features. These efforts were instrumental in securing a substantial competitive advantage in the market.
experience.sky: As part of the Peacock frontend team, I ensured a seamless user experience for NBCUniversal's streaming service. I also contributed to a scalable global platform with millions of monthly views, by taking ownership of the development process, I actively participated in product discussions and advocated for quality, security, and performance enhancements.
experience.wise: In my initial role as a Lead Front-End Developer & UX/UI Designer, I had the incredible opportunity to build an online lottery platform, from the ground up, called Lotto Jade. As part of the foundational team at our company, I played a crucial role in shaping our approach to solution development. In this capacity, I frequently engaged in communication with stakeholders and clients, conducting demos and discussions that highlighted our company's values and strategic goals. This involvement was vital in ensuring that our technical solutions were not only innovative but also closely aligned with client needs and market trends, fostering strong relationships and setting the stage to exceed expectations at every turn.
experience.freelance: As a freelancer, I've successfully implemented web solutions for several businesses, owning the entire process from concept design to deployment, offering market projection through personalized guidance and client-focused solutions tailored to business requirements. I've standardized output using a cutting-edge, responsive, mobile-first approach and strategy, aligning with current market trends and user expectations. Frequently I thorough assessments of UX and UI designs for technical feasibility, SEO optimization tests and branding.

skills_page.soft_skills: Arts and human-behavior had always been a huge part of my life. Through my other passions like theatre, music, and psychology, I was able to develop versatile skills that contributed immensely to my emotional, social, and psychological health, revealing an asset in the work environment. Some of them are creativity, emotional intelligence, empathy, interpersonal skills, critical thinking, problem-solving, and communication.
